website_summaries.verdict: Features four displays, each with a high range of UV detection.
pros: We love the long lifespan of the battery that reviews suggest works to measure UV levels, especially outdoors
Comes with features such as over range indication and zero adjust
This product is able to distinguish well among light-sensitive scales
cons: Additional data analysis resources may be needed

customer_reviews.title: Works and I use it in my everyday life for photosensitivity
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I just use it for the basic reading - UV light or not, and how high do the numbers go. I take this with me. I have extreme photosensitivity. I wouldn't know, for instance, if the hanging fixture over the booth at the restaurant, would make me sick until I sat under it for a bit. Now I can just test it. Some bulbs are PUMPING out UV. Compact fluorescents and halogens produce shocking amounts.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: great, sturdy, product for measuring sun protection.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, well built. It has two "scales" so microwatts/cmsq and milliwatts/cm can be used depending on the intensity of light. Full summer sun in the 12 milliwatt range, while indoor, through curtains, clothing, etc. in 100's of microwatts. One can get a great "feel" for the difference in intensity using the two scales. If one keeps in mind that it's uvb sensitivity is only 20-30% of its uva sensitivity, one can still use it to compare the protection various materials provide for sun exposure, just by comparing the *relative* intensity of measurments with/without protection. It cannot "switch" between measuring uva, then uvb separately, event though the manual suggests it might be possible.
customer_reviews.author: John Thoren

customer_reviews.title: Wanted UV Index device...this isn't it.
customer_reviews.text: Because of a medical condition, my wife needed a UV index device, but this isn't it. Turns out UV index is a complicated calculation, not a reading. For UV Index, better use a local weather app. This device might be a very nice and accurate UV meter, but I have no way of knowing...so 3 stars. Refund was prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy for Reptile UVB light testing.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't test the narrow spectrum of reptile lights, which was the sole purpose of this purchase. Can't tell if it works well with other applications. Seems well built, plug 'n' play, gives a quick measurement.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Gray

customer_reviews.title: Accurate Calibrated UV AB meter
customer_reviews.text: The UV513AB meter is best value in a calibrated UV AB meter. The meter is accurate over a very large range and can accurately measure the UV protection afforded by shirts, windshield tinting, etc. While it is more expensive than the UV index meters it is much more accurate and precise. If you are looking for a reliable accurate measurement of UV AB this product is an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT UVC
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as a radiometer for UVC and it's range is for UVA-B
customer_reviews.author: S. Iñiguez

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet.
customer_reviews.text: Came in a quality storage case, mostly intuitive to operate. Would have like some information on how to interpret readings regarding effects of materials, skin, etc.., of the UV light measured. Still learning to use the instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my lab to replace a UV ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my lab to replace a UV meter from Suss that was quoted to me at $3000. For $120 this works exactly as the other one, and I even checked the calibration.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Sarangan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Once you read the instruction and learned how to use the features, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Wingman

customer_reviews.title: Great for the starter like myself
customer_reviews.text: High quality materials and screen. Great for the starter like myself.
customer_reviews.author: BargainFinder

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This meter produces repeatable results. While I have not calibrated it, its results have been in line with my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Good meter
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for our project for science fair. It is very acurate. We received tracking information and came when we expected it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Z.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these meters for 5 years plus. Excellent results
customer_reviews.author: Everett Smith

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: very good product and a very good price. Sehr gutes Messgerät zu günstigem Preis.
customer_reviews.author: xyz

customer_reviews.title: Very Well
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived according to plan. I arrive in good condition because it was well packed. The packet size was perfect. I recommend this dealer. Very serious and especially according to the specifications llegun was on the page we. I congratulate the dealer for its seriousness. thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Neyder Pérez Arce

customer_reviews.title: Machine will NOT tell you if the light is UVA or UVB , so if u r  buying it for that reason..dont buy this machine
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying this machine to find out whether the sunlight in your area is either UVA or UVB and any type of light index number (280nm-400nm) you will be sorely disappointed. Its absolutely useless! You will get a display of various numbers that do not seem to relate to anything relavent. sooooo disappointed! I wish they would have mentioned this fact before my husband wasted $158 on it for my xmas present. It does not even display whether the light was UVA or UVB...utterly useless.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: product is working out well
customer_reviews.text: I dont see that there were any problem with it as far as I can tell everything is working out with it just fine
customer_reviews.author: Chrlens Shields

product_meta.title: General Tools UV513AB Digital UVA/UVB Meter, 280-400 nm
product_meta.description:
Style:280-400 nmFROM THE MANUFACTURER


This instrument is designed to measure ultraviolet light in the range from 280 to 400 nanometers. The illumination range of the meter allows users to conduct the most precise quantitative measurements of ultraviolet radiation for radiometry and laboratory requirements, UV-curing in off-set printing, lamp UV intensity and aging, industrial process monitoring, semiconductor fabrication , sterilization and environmental monitoring.
